colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @009A *, ,(ZHES RJE BTZUN N'A RO MKHA' SPYOD MA'I SBYOR MA'I BLA MA'I RNAL 'BYOR DANG SGRUB THABS MDOR BSDUS GNAD DON TSANG BA 'DI LTA BU ZHIG DGOS ZHES SGRUB PA'I RGYAL MTSAN 'DZIN PA RNAL 'BYOR GYI DBANG PHYUGS MTSO DKON MCHOG CHOS 'PHEL NAS LHA DANG SER PO DANG BCAS BSKUL BA DANG, 'DI KA'I ZHABS DRUNG SPRUL PA'I SKU NGAG DBANG BSTAN 'DZIN 'PHRIN LAS RNAM RGYAL NAS KYANG LHA DANG GA-YER DNGUL GYI ME TOG DANG BCAS BSKUL NGOR, ^ SH'AKYA'I BTZUN PA BLO BZANG RGYAL MTSAN SENGGE SBYAR PA'I YI GE @009B PA NI MDZOD PA'I TSA BO BSTAN PA RGYAL MTSAN GYIS MDZAD PA DZA YANTU, ,BKRA SHIS PAR GYUR CIG , ,,)
